## Data Wrangling with R

**Instructors:** [Andrew Jaffe](http://www.aejaffe.com/) and [John Muschelli](http://johnmuschelli.com/)

**Class Schedule:**

* M/T: 8am-2pm PST, W: 8am-11am PST

* Location: Zoom (see class email for link)

**Software:**

* [R project](http://www.r-project.org/)
* [Rstudio](http://www.rstudio.com/)
* [Bioconductor](http://bioconductor.org/)
* [Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/)

**Schedule**

Day 1

1. [Introduction](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1-j8KAkDUiYWoTpuSaRZqUBE47LhZVThicjSHPWEXGVQ/edit?usp=sharing) or [PDF](lecture_notes/sisbid_intro_2020.pdf)

3. [Data Input/Output Part 2](lecture_notes/Data_IO_Part2.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Data_IO_Part2.pdf), [lab](labs/data-io-lab-part1.Rmd), [lab key](labs/data-io-lab-part2-key.Rmd)

Day 2: 

7. [Data Subsetting Part 1](lecture_notes/Data_Subsetting_Part1.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Data_Subsetting_Part1.pdf), [lab](labs/data-subsetting-lab-part1.Rmd), [lab key](labs/data-subsetting-lab-part2-key.Rmd)
8. [Data Subsetting Part 2](lecture_notes/Data_Subsetting_Part2.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Data_Subsetting_Part2.pdf), [lab](labs/data-subsetting-lab-part2.Rmd), [lab key](labs/data-subsetting-lab-part2-key.Rmd)

10. [Data Cleaning](lecture_notes/Data_Cleaning.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Data_Cleaning.pdf) [lab](labs/data-cleaning-lab.Rmd), [lab key](labs/data-cleaning-lab-key.Rmd)
11. [Data Reshaping](lecture_notes/Data_Reshaping.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Data_Reshaping.pdf), [lab](labs/data-reshaping-lab.Rmd), [lab key](labs/data-reshaping-lab-key.Rmd)

Day 3: 

13. [Advanced Data Input/Output](lecture_notes/Advanced_Data_IO.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Advanced_Data_IO.pdf), [lab](labs/advanced-io-lab.Rmd),  [lab key](labs/advanced-io-lab-key.Rmd)
14. [Functionally Programming](lecture_notes/Functional_Programming.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Functional_Programming.pdf), [lab](labs/functional-program-lab.Rmd)
15. [Bioconductor for Genomics](lecture_notes/Bioconductor_intro.html) or [PDF](lecture_notes/Bioconductor_intro.pdf)
16. [Wrap up](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1DIEOk6JMF9pPpFhvoI9Mv8yDdSZsehvqI_5K34VPN1o/edit?usp=sharing) or [PDF](lecture_notes/sisbid_wrap_up_2020.pdf)
